# ASAccessory.AccessoryState.awaitingAuthorization

**Case**

The accessory is selected, but full authorization is still pending.

## Declaration

```swift
case awaitingAuthorization
```

## Accessory states

- **ASAccessory.AccessoryState.unauthorized**: The accessory is invalid or unauthorized.
- **ASAccessory.AccessoryState.authorized**: The accessory is authorized and available.

items.description: The accessory is invalid or unauthorized.
items.name: ASAccessory.AccessoryState.unauthorized

items.description: The accessory is authorized and available.
